Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't be my choice again”
Reviews.Author: GLM3
Reviews.Content: My wife and I spent three days at Homestead, it wasn't pleasant, but was tolerable. The best part of the stay was the kitchenette, it had a full size refrigerator, stovetop, microwave, coffee maker and toaster. It didn't have any forks and we needed to rewash everything before we used it. The freezer had a bad odor. The concept of Homestead was good, but the housekeeping was terrible. Overall the room was filthy. To make things better they need king sized beds at least for couples, a good hosekeeping staff and to pay attention to details. It would not be my choice again. The staff was friendly and helpful if you could find them.

Reviews.Title: “TERRIBLE STAFF, BED BUGS, TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE...GO SOMEWHERE ELSE”
Reviews.Author: Jason K
Reviews.Content: TERRIBLE STAFF, BED BUGS, TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE... long story short, GO SOMEWHERE ELSE. I am not the kind of person to go online and write a negative review, but I made an exception for this place. I could not believe how terrible my experience was there. Let me tell you why to STAY AWAY. I recently had to quickly relocate to Memphis for a job. I found this place online and it seemed okay... WRONG. I woke up after my first night there at 3 am and my back and neck were covered in BED BUG BITES. I know that they were bed bugs because I have been bit before and have an allergy to them (Severe itching and irritation, red rash, swelling). Not to mention that when I had woke up in the middle of the night I saw one one myself, flicked it off and then flung my sheets off... then proceeded to spend the rest of the night in the bathroom... NOT COOL. Now, being the laid back, easy going person that I am, I went to the office as soon as I could to let them know of the problem and get a different room. I told them that I wanted a new room and that my room was infested with bed bugs and it needed to be quarantined. The manager over heard me saying this and stepped out to tell me to, "keep it down and not make accusations that aren't necessarily true"... WTF. I showed him some of the bites and told him that I actually saw the bed bugs, but he was too worried about control damage control and preventing any other people in the lobby from hearing about the fact that they had bed bugs to give two craps about customer service. After much persuading he told me he would, "investigate it further". I am not one to get mad, however, when I wake up at 3 am covered in bed bug bites and then tell the management about it and basically get called a liar and then mocks me, I tend to feel more than a little bit PO'd. Moral of this story... MANAGEMENT SUUUUCKS. DO NOT STAY HERE. The only decent thing about this hotel is the location. It's in a fairly safe area and there is a good selection of places to eat and shop. BUT I WILL NEVER, NEVER STAY HERE AGAIN.

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected, Will book again here”
Reviews.Author: MissBruce75
Reviews.Content: Found this hotel online and booked because of the price. I was kind of weary because of the price but confirmed the location (by a friend) was safe. Upon arrival I was greeted by a friendly staff. They were great! Very informative of vending machines, atm, and convenient store. I stayed at this hotel overnight and was very impressed. The room was extremely clean, my a/c unit worked wonderfully, the bed was comfortable (slept like a baby) and my bathroom was very clean. I will definitely be staying at this hotel. It was great for the money and they offer shuttle to and from the airport. Thanks to the hotel and staff for a wonderful stay!

Reviews.Title: “It was terrible at this locatioo!”
Reviews.Author: superfreakin
Reviews.Content: Words cannot describe how awful the experience. We complained to the manager-nothing. i called corporate-nothing. he you like filthy rooms and no service, stay here:-(

Reviews.Title: “Want be back”
Reviews.Author: Laquana
Reviews.Content: Me and my husband was ask if we would stay here since the extended stay didn't have any available rooms we agreed to. This hotel was not clean at all, our room was dirty , however the staff were very friendly they came and cleaned up room for us but want be back.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible”
Reviews.Author: horrify
Reviews.Content: It is one of the most horrible hotels that I have ever been in my life. The rooms are old and not very clean. I dont think you must spend more than 1 day if you dont want to suffer of pain in your back. Staff not very polite and sometimes they just ignore you if you have a complain

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Staff, good location”
Reviews.Author: BLACKBFLY40
Reviews.Content: This hotel was average. It had everything that I needed. The staff were great. I am a bit concerned about the cleanliness of my room. The carpet was cleaned as well as the bed, but the bathroom was not so clean. I did let the staff know and they apologized. I ended up receiving a survey for the hotel but it was the wrong hotel. That particular manager called me back regarding the concerns that were written(even though it was not the right hotel). I think I will book with that particular hotel because the manager did call me as for the homestead suite manager, HAVENT HEARD FROM HER YET!

Reviews.Title: “Nice East Memphis Location easy access to Interstate”
Reviews.Author: eatmoresalmon
Reviews.Content: This was a 2 star priceline booking for total of just under $55. (My bid was $41) The room as clean, the bed was firm. The remote didn't work well, but the front desk brought one that worked fine. I didn't use the microwave or the fridge. The coffee wasn't very good using the in-room drip coffee maker. The bathroom was well lit, clean and the towels were nice. The neighborhood was well manicured, sidewalks, trees, green grass and I did a 4.5 mile run around the neighborhood and there are a lot of business parks in the area. Nice neighborhood.

Reviews.Title: “DISGUSTED IN MEMPHIS”
Reviews.Author: marchiati
Reviews.Content: To begin when we got to the hotel, we were checked in promptly, we were given a room on the first floor which was wonderful. When my 7 year old daughter and myself opened the door to the room we were hit in the face with the smell of stale fried fish. The room reaked of the fish odor. I immediately went back to the front desk and asked if they had air freshener or another room. I was told that there were no other rooms and that they would bring some air freshener. They brought the air freshener and sprayed and then offered to bring a machine to pull the smell out of the room if I was going to go out for dinner. I was told the machine would pull the smell out and that it would only take 30 minutes to do this. We left and were gone over 2 hours and when we returned the smell was worse because the air had been turned off in the room. I returned to the front desk and the second manager said she would see if they could find the machine to pull the smell out. This was supposed to be done while I was gone. The second manager came to the room and smelled the fish and said that she would move us to another room. Keep in mind I was told in the beginning that they didn't have any other rooms. We were moved to a second room on the other side of the building and the very end of the hall. This room didn't smell, it did have a few gnats flying around in the room , there was hair from a previous tenant visable in the tub and the bathtub in this room as well as he first room, had some kind of rust looking stains in the tub, there was mold and mildew around the wall of the tub in both rooms and the water took about twenty minutes to drain from the tub. Last but certainly not least, the price of the room was different and I was not offered a refund or a discount.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: HomePhi
Reviews.Content: Stayed three nights here at the end of June. I was expecting far more, given the numerous positive reviews on this site. My main complaint concerns cleanliness: the sheets and blankets had several stains, and the carpet had lots of pet hair, as if nobody had vacuumed. The halls reeked of cooking food (and not in a good way). Management was friendly, and the internet worked very well. But unless you're staying for an extended period of time (when, presumably, you would be bringing your own toiletries) it's a bit annoying to come for a short trip and have to supply your own bath products and have no housekeeping (especially when the room could have used cleaning).

Reviews.Title: “the worse stay i've had at a hotel”
Reviews.Author: marty1279
Reviews.Content: My stay at the Homestead suite was anything but pleasant. The rooms were very dirty and the hotel staff and service was horrible. At one point during my stay there was no toilet paper you had to supply your own. One morning i woke up to the biggest TN cockroach sitting on my kitchen sink. After advising the staff of this they were not shocked they advised me it was a very common thing with being on the first floor. But the final straw was when my truck window was busted out during daylight while i was at work. My truck was also backed into. They advised me sorry for your inconvience and they could not do anything about the matter.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: LouLouLouey
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with my husband for 3 days. When we walked into the room it smelt funny - I couldn't place the smell but it wasn't a nice smell. For that reason I've rated it 4/5 for cleanliness. But other than that it was a great place. We had a full kitchen - it was very clean and the appliances were in good condition. The bathroom was big and clean, and the bedroom was also spacious and clean. The staff were very friendly and helpul when answering our questions. The Studio Suites are on a very busy road but we didn't notice any traffic noise at all. Its not in a central location - about 12 miles or so from the tourist srea and Gracelands. But as we had a car and there was plenty of parking at the attractions we wanted to see this wasn't a problem. Overall we were very happy with staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Premiere Customer Service and a home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: neseab
Reviews.Content: The Customer service is great...making the reservation was quick and my room was ready when I made it. The rooms have a nice kitchenette with the dishes and everything included. The poplar location was just minutes from the interstate, and there are many restaurants in the area. I had a very comfortable and safe stay.

Reviews.Title: “HARD beds...nice place.”
Reviews.Author: krzsrh
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed just 1 night in this facility. The personel were very friendly, and offered to help us get things that we might need. Check-in and check-out were very simple and a breeze. I can not speak of any of the onsite amenities as we did not use them. However the room was a great size. We had a king bed, a chair and ottoman, a desk, and dresser, and we still had plenty of room to move around. The room was clean, and ok looking (standard room decorations). Now for the worst thing....the bed was as hard as a rock!! My wife and I did not sleep well because of this. My body was in pain, the bed felt as hard as the floor. I am glad we only spent 1 night here, I would not have been able to sleep on that bed more than once. If you like very firm beds, then this is the place for you. If you like anything softer than hard concrete, stay away. If they offered softer beds, then I would concider a stay here again, but not until the beds are changed. They should give people an option...smoking, or non-smoking...firm bed, or soft bed...better yet offer sleep number beds.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Value”
Reviews.Author: Randalljay
Reviews.Content: Excellent value for money. We bought a few things for breakfast because they don't offer it. We had a microwave + mini-kitchen. Just great. Location is good because unless you're there to booze it up on Beale you have to drive anyway --- and it's a quick exit if you're going south!

Reviews.Title: “What an AWESOME PLACE TO STAY !”
Reviews.Author: cakeladybk
Reviews.Content: i travel a lot each month, and I ALWAYS stay at the Homestead Studio Suites on Poplar Ave in memphis, TN. I actually found this hotel by mistake....but I guess it really wasn't a "mistake'. The employees are friendly, Check in and out are a breeze...They even know customers by thier first names.( I love that !) On one of my stays there, I became ill, they noticed that I didnt leave for dinner, knew I wasn't feeling well, and called my room just to make sure I was OK. Now, that's over and above service ! They have kitchenette rooms, the rooms are always clean, and the hotel smells good. (Ive been in a few that didn't ! ) I would recommend this Hotel to everyone. It's close to highways, has enough restaurants around it, and it is in a safe part of town, ( Being a woman, and traveling alone...you have to look at those kind of things ) Anyway...you won't be disappointed with your stay here ! Thanks for giving me the opportunity to tell this ! Have a great stay ! Becky Kramer, Hazelwood, Mo.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Great Price”
Reviews.Author: Teambanzai
Reviews.Content: This is an above average hotel in a really good part of town and you can usually get rooms at great rates. The lobby is basic small front counter with freindly and efficient staff. There is a small continetal breafast area just across the way with a few tables, chairs, coffee, etc. The main appeals to this hotel however are the rooms... very good size. We had a kitchenette with a full fridge, stove with prep area and cabinets. The bathroom was large, the tub appeard to be oversized and their ws plenty of counter space for both me and the wife in there at the same time. The king size bud was comfy, nothing special. Room did feature a full size closet and their were two chairs with the table. Another big plus is the location. This hotels is smack in between Germantown and Memphis... you have easy access to Interstate 240 (about 1 mile) and their are lots of great restaurants from walking distance to a 2 minute drive. Also 3-4 pretty big shopping centers with great stores. Plus the area is very safe. Overall I would stay here again in a heartbeat. It is a much better room for the price than most rooms in the area

HotelInfo.Name: Homestead Studio Suites Memphis/Poplar
HotelInfo.Address: 6500 Poplar Ave., Memphis, TN 38119
